tool.name: Pmxmutate
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the `PMX mutate <https://github.com/deGrootLab/pmx>`_ module.

param.name: input_structure_path
param.label: input PDB,GRO file
param.help: Path to the input structure file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_b_structure_path
param.label: input PDB,GRO file
param.help: Path to the mutated input structure file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_structure_path
param.label: output PDB,GRO name
param.help: Path to the output structure file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: mutation_list
param.label: mutation_list
param.help: separated by commas. If no chain is provided as chain code all the chains in the pdb file will be mutated. ie: "A:ALA15CYS"

param.name: resinfo
param.label: resinfo
param.help: Print a 3 to 1 letter residue list.

param.name: dna
param.label: dna
param.help: Generate hybrid residue for the DNA nucleotides.

param.name: rna
param.label: rna
param.help: Generate hybrid residue for the RNA nucleotides.

param.name: pmx_cli_path
param.label: pmx_cli_path
param.help: Path to the PMX Python2.7 client.

param.name: restart
param.label: restart
param.help: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.
